item.description:
Let's go check out a really big shark on a really big screen!!!  Come join us and get scared out of your seat.

In celebration of Shark Week, Chunky's is thinking a FREE showing of JAWS is a must!  I agree!

They will be bringing back JAWS to the Big Screen the movie that forever made us paranoid about going into the ocean past our ankles. Steven Spielberg’s terrifying thriller about a shark and how it terrorized the vacationers in one New England beach.

Sunscreen and beach towel are optional.

Cost for the movie: FREE

Food: You pay for what you eat, we will be getting separate checks, so it is easy to figure out for everyone.

Reservation: I will be making one for the group

We will only wait 15 minutes for you to arrive at the meeting place, if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

If you have not paid your dues this year, I will take your payment at this event.  Thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.

I look forward to seeing you at this event.

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside, come look for us.
item.name: Great movie: JAWS
